title: Man City to take loss on Grealish with Napoli torn over him and Garnacho
subtitle: ITALIAN side have already signed Grealish's former City team-mate Kevin De Bruyne. They are now pondering over a move for another Prem star.

title: Moment Bonucci wipes out Houghton with crunching tackle at Soccer Aid
subtitle: BONUCCI put in a crunching tackle on the former Lionesses star. And the challenge spread like wildfire on social media.

title: Tonali's stunning fiancee Juliette branded 'most beautiful bride to be' on hen do
subtitle: NEWCASTLE star's partner wore elegant dress as she toasted her upcoming nuptials. Juliette enjoyed a night on the town as she puckered up to bottle of booze.

title: Chelsea to unleash new spine tonight with six stars set for debuts against LAFC
subtitle: ENZO MARESCA'S men face tricky test against Olivier Giroud and Co. But there could be a new look to Blues as six stars push to play.

title: Tottenham star Manor Solomon stuck in Israel after flying home to get married
subtitle: WINGER tied the knot with partner Dana Voshina on Thursday. But just a day later, the conflict with Iran escalated and the airspace has been shut by the military.

title: Chloe Kelly enjoys sun-kissed holiday as Arsenal star rests before Euro 2025
subtitle: STRIKER enjoys blissful downtime with Man Utd ace Gabby George and their partners. Fans loved it as Kelly shared bikini-clad pics

title: Cole Palmer rocks £220k luxury watch on flight to Club World Cup
subtitle: CHELSEA star proved he's living the dream both on and off the pitch after rocking an incredible watch on his flight to the Club World Cup. The 23-year-old winger has been impressing fans since his big-money move from the Etihad to Stamford Bridge but he's proved he’s not just about fancy footwork and goals.

title: Football could introduce new transfer rule that would slash fees for players
subtitle: AGENTS claimed the October ruling was the first step towards a US-style “free agency” for players, with fees becoming a thing of the past and stars only liable to pay the balance of their contracts when they switch clubs.

title: Kyle Walker's huge £340 Chinese takeaway order including £105 on crispy duck
subtitle: MAN CITY star's mega order has emerged on social media. The former City skipper is currently in limbo with a year remaining on his contract.
